See  the  left - hand  cell  of  the  illustration  here .  The  lower  trop osphere  temperature  data  are  calculated  from  a  series  of  satellites  with  overlapping  operation  periods ,  not  from  a  single  satellite .  The  monthly  U AH  lower  trop osphere  temperature  data  is  the  product  of  the  Earth  System  Science  Center  of  the  University  of  Alabama  in  Hunts ville  ( U AH ).  U AH  provides  the  data  broken  down  into  numerous  subs ets .  See  the  webpage  here
